Plot: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?
Title: Terminator Salvation
Actors: Christian Bale, Sam Worthington, Moon Bloodgood, Helena Bonham Carter
tomatoConsensus: With storytelling as robotic as the film's iconic villains, Terminator Salvation offers plenty of great effects but lacks the heart of the original films.
